Articles.Content:
So i'm having a couple of issues and I can't figure out the culprit. First issue is the stock toolbar is spamming icons after a few scene changes and I can no longer get to the various mod icons. Second issue is KSP will randomly stop me from building anything or rotating the screen both while in SPH/VAB and on Runway/Launchpad. I have tried removing mods and adding them back but can't seam to find the one or combo of them that is causing the issues. I have also verified files with steam and reinstalled all mods. Any help is appreciated.

Player.log: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1ixBOQ5VjVl_jjIOc9DoRibpffbgNXRlg

Mod List:

Edited January 25, 2020 by Pratherdude
That is a long list. Check if dependencies and correct verions of mods are installed.

On 1/23/2020 at 11:00 PM, Pratherdude said:

First issue is the stock toolbar is spamming icons after a few scene changes and I can no longer get to the various mod icons.

This is usually caused by a mod not properly destroying it's toolbar button, and/or not destroying the "Add to Toolbar" GameEvent when the mod is disabled (most mods are disabled and then re-enabled on a scene change).

The culprits are usually the mods who's icons are being duplicated.

Edited January 26, 2020 by severedsolo
